bibl.title: Recovery and Dispersion of Bakchias Papyri: A Typical Event of Papyrology.

bibl.author: CAPASSO, Mario

bibl.note: Bacchias: les fouilles de B.P. Grenfell, A.S. Hunt et D.G. Hogarth en 1896, les fouilles clandestines ca. 1930, la dispersion des papyrus dans diverses collections.
